lead_paragraph: Bonus points will be awarded in a radical shake-up of next year's Six Nations as tournament organisers seek to encourage teams to adopt a more attacking style of play.

headline.print_headline: Bonus Points to Reward Try-Scoring in 2017 Six Nations
headline.main: Bonus Points to Reward Try-Scoring in 2017 Six Nations
